name: Myztree
description:
A 2.5D procedurally generated dungeon-crawler in a plant-infested world. Race against the clock to make it to the top!

A realtime top-down dungeon crawler with the fast-paced mechanics of Gauntlet and Pokemon Mystery Dungeon where you make your way through floors of a proceedurally generated dungeon.

Roster:

  • Desmond Oliver (Project Lead, Musician, Programmer)
  • Anthony Ellis (Lead Programmer, UI)
  • Lowen DiPaula (Programmer)
  • Raychel Thress (Artist)
  • Isaac Brown (3D Modelling)
